prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Brass, Drums, Organ, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Piano, Brass, Drums, and Organ, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Piano, Brass, Drums, and Organ, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Piano, Brass, Drums, and Organ, excluding Guitar.
